events.message: We have successfully received your application for the software engineer position. Our team will review your credentials and get back to you shortly.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering department based on your experience and qualifications as a software developer.
A recruiter specializing in engineering roles has been assigned to your application to assist you through the hiring process.
Your initial screening interview was completed successfully, and the feedback was very encouraging regarding your technical skills and experience.
Thank you for promptly responding to our queries and confirming your availability for the next rounds of the interview process.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 10th at 2 PM UTC. Please prepare to discuss your experience with software development methodologies.
You completed the technical interview with excellent performance. Your problem-solving skills and coding ability impressed our interviewers.
The HR interview is scheduled for May 14th at 10 AM UTC. This conversation will cover company culture, salary expectations, and role fit.
You attended the HR interview, which went very smoothly. The HR team was pleased with your alignment to our company values and your salary expectations.
We are excited to extend you an official offer for the Software Engineer role, including a competitive salary and benefits package.
You have provided positive feedback regarding the offer and expressed enthusiasm about joining the engineering team.
You officially accepted our offer to join as a Software Engineer. We look forward to a great working relationship.
Your onboarding process has started. Welcome to the team! Please complete all mandatory trainings and set up your development environment.
The hiring process is officially closed. You have joined officially as a Software Engineer and your profile has been updated in our HR system.
